segments.text: What ’ s your schedule like this year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty busy . I have to pick up a lot of credits this year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m majoring in French literature .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , don ’ t you have to take that class on 18th century poetry ? It ’ s really difficult . I hear the students in that class have to write a paper 100 pages long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right . We got the assignment last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remind me never to sign up for that course !
segments.speaker: S1
